CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1958, pg. A14 reads: " Graduation Party Honorees - Following promotion from McKelvy School to the seventh grade and Herron Hill Junior High School, these young people were feted with a graduation party by Hill City, under the direction of Mrs. Eunice Cook. Left to right, first row: Edith Cannon, James Smith, Mary Batie, Roland Fitzgerald and Jane Dukes.  Second row: Dexter Price, Barbara Chapmen and Melvin Richards.  Third row: Lorena Brown and Ilene Hare.  Fourth row: Edward Page, Lorraine Irish and Richard Gaines. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of McKelvy School graduates, from left, first row: Edith Cannon, James Smith, Mary Batie, Roland Fitzgerald, and Jane Dukes; second row: Dexter Price, Barbara Chapmen, and Melvin Richards; third row: Lorena Brown and Ilene Hare; fourth row: Edward Page, Lorraine Irish, and Richard Gaines, posed on stairs in Hill City for graduation party, another version
